aboutPage.metaTitle: About Anmol Wholesale | Restaurant Expertise & Wholesale Power
aboutPage.metaDescription: Discover Anmol Wholesale, Stockholm's leading B2B supplier. With 5+ years of restaurant experience, we provide authentic Indo-Pak ingredients and manufacture the Electric Mini Tandoor. Quality guaranteed by chefs, for chefs.
aboutPage.heroSubtitle: {tagline} - Your trusted B2B wholesale partner for professional kitchens across Sweden and Europe.
aboutPage.storyLead: Anmol Wholesale emerged from the success and real-world demands of Anmol Sweets & Restaurant, a beloved culinary destination in Stockholm known for authentic Indo-Pak cuisine.
aboutPage.storyP1: We're not just distributors—we're restaurateurs who understand the pressures of running a professional kitchen. We know what it's like when an ingredient shipment is late, when quality isn't consistent, or when you need a specific product that no one else stocks. That's why we built Anmol Wholesale: to create the reliable supply chain we wished existed when we were starting out.
aboutPage.storyP2: As the designers and manufacturers of the Anmol Electric Tandoor—a professional-grade tandoor used in our own restaurant and now in commercial kitchens across Europe—we understand what professional equipment needs to deliver. We supply what we use ourselves. No compromises, no shortcuts.
aboutPage.offerTitle: What We Supply to Professional Kitchens
aboutPage.offer1Desc: Basmati rice by the pallet, premium spices (whole & ground), dals, flours, ghee, condiments. Brands: Shan, MDH, TRS, India Gate, National Foods.
aboutPage.offer2Desc: Anmol Electric Tandoor (our flagship product), commercial cookware, serving equipment, and specialty tools for authentic cuisine preparation.
aboutPage.offer3Desc: Seasonal vegetables (karela, bhindi, tinda, methi), herbs, frozen items. Cold chain maintained from warehouse to your kitchen.
aboutPage.offer4Desc: Case and pallet quantities of popular brands: Haldiram's, Britannia, Parle, plus traditional sweets and pantry essentials.
aboutPage.whyTitle: Why B2B Partners Choose Anmol Wholesale
aboutPage.why1Desc: We operate Anmol Sweets & Restaurant. Every product we sell meets our own professional kitchen standards. Your reputation is our reputation.
aboutPage.why2Desc: Own delivery fleet (Stockholm), DHL partnership (Sweden & EU), third-party freight support, or Ex-warehouse pickup. You choose what works for your business.
aboutPage.why3Desc: Business accounts receive automatic volume discounts: 10-49 units (-10%), 50-99 units (-16%), 100+ units (-20%). The more you order, the more you save.
aboutPage.why4Desc: We serve 28+ countries across the EU and Scandinavia. Whether you're opening in Berlin, Oslo, or Copenhagen, we deliver authentic ingredients to your door.
aboutPage.commitQualityDesc: We supply what we use in our own restaurant
aboutPage.commitSupplyDesc: Consistent availability when you need it
aboutPage.commitEuropeDesc: From Stockholm to your kitchen, anywhere in EU
aboutPage.commitB2BDesc: Built for restaurants, caterers, grocery stores
aboutPage.warehouseDesc: Central Stockholm location with easy access for pickup and delivery.
aboutPage.ctaDesc: Open a business account to access wholesale pricing and preferential terms.

quickOrderPage.metaDescription: Speed up your wholesale ordering with our quick order form. Search products, enter quantities, and submit your order in minutes. Perfect for regular reordering and bulk purchases.
quickOrderPage.badge: From Our Restaurant Kitchen to Yours
quickOrderPage.title: Quick Order Form
quickOrderPage.subtitle: Place bulk orders in minutes. Search products by name, enter quantities, and submit—it's that simple. Perfect for regular reorders and large purchases.
quickOrderPage.step1Desc: Type at least 3 letters in the product field to see autocomplete suggestions. Select the products you need.
quickOrderPage.step2Desc: Specify how many units you need for each product. Add more lines if you need to order multiple products.
quickOrderPage.step3Desc: Review your order total and submit. You'll receive an email confirmation, and our team will contact you within 24 hours.
quickOrderPage.helpDesc: Our team is here to assist you with your wholesale orders. Contact us anytime:

quotePage.metaDescription: Get customized wholesale pricing for bulk orders, pallet quantities, and recurring supplies. Our B2B team provides competitive rates for restaurants, grocery stores, and caterers across Sweden and Europe.
quotePage.badge: From Our Restaurant Kitchen to Yours
quotePage.title: Request a Wholesale Quote
quotePage.subtitle: Get personalized B2B pricing for bulk orders, pallet quantities, or recurring restaurant supplies. We understand the needs of professional kitchens—because we run one ourselves.
quotePage.buildQuoteDesc: Search products, set quantities, and submit for personalized B2B pricing.
quotePage.responseDesc: Our B2B sales team reviews all wholesale quote requests within 24 hours on business days (Monday - Friday). For urgent orders or immediate assistance, contact us directly.

quotePage.step4: Once approved, we coordinate delivery (own fleet, DHL, or Ex-Warehouse pickup).
quotePage.popularNote: And many more authentic Indo-Pak ingredients for professional kitchens.
quotePage.fasterDesc: Create a verified B2B account for instant wholesale pricing on standard catalog items, streamlined reordering, and dedicated account management.

deliveryPage.metaTitle: B2B Wholesale Delivery Stockholm | 15% Lower Prices | Anmol Wholesale
deliveryPage.metaDescription: Reliable B2B delivery across Sweden & Scandinavia. Own fleet for Stockholm, 15% lower wholesale prices, and Ex-Warehouse pickup in Spånga. Built for professional kitchens.
deliveryPage.heroDesc: From Our Restaurant Kitchen to Yours. Reliable wholesale distribution across Sweden and Scandinavia.
deliveryPage.introLead: Welcome to Anmol Wholesale – your trusted B2B partner for authentic Indo-Pak ingredients and professional kitchen equipment.
deliveryPage.introDesc: As restaurateurs ourselves, we understand the critical importance of a reliable supply chain. We offer a hybrid distribution model combining our own dedicated delivery fleet for the Stockholm region with strategic partnerships with DHL, DB Schenker, PostNord, and other freight carriers to serve restaurants, grocery stores, caterers, and food chains across Sweden, Scandinavia, and Europe.
deliveryPage.fleetDesc: Our own delivery service provides personalized, flexible delivery for B2B clients in the greater Stockholm region. Direct from our Spånga warehouse to your kitchen.
deliveryPage.freeShipDesc: Enjoy free delivery on all orders over 5,000 kr within the Stockholm region
deliveryPage.coverageItems: Central Stockholm & City|Spånga, Kista, Järfalla|Solna, Sundbyberg, Bromma|Nacka, Värmdö, Huddinge|Södertälje & Märsta/Arlanda
deliveryPage.dhlDesc: For wholesale clients outside Stockholm, we partner with DHL for reliable nationwide delivery across Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and Finland.
deliveryPage.dhlTags: Weight-based Rates|Tracked Shipments|Business Day Delivery|Pallet Freight
deliveryPage.thirdPartyDesc: Have your own logistics contract? We support Ex-Works pickup by your preferred carrier (DB Schenker, PostNord, etc.) directly from our loading dock.
deliveryPage.pickupDesc: Pickup directly from our Spånga warehouse for maximum cost efficiency. Order online, receive confirmation, and collect at your convenience.
deliveryPage.questionsDesc: Our B2B logistics team is here to help with bulk orders and freight quotes.

faqPage.metaTitle: B2B Wholesale FAQ | 15% Lower Prices | Anmol Wholesale Stockholm
faqPage.metaDescription: Expert answers to wholesale ordering, 15% lower B2B pricing, and bulk logistics. Serving restaurants across Sweden & Europe with authentic Indo-Pak ingredients and the Electric Mini Tandoor.
faqPage.title: B2B Wholesale FAQ
faqPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about wholesale ordering, B2B accounts, bulk delivery, tiered pricing, and our Indo-Pak products for professional kitchens. Can't find your answer? Our team is here to help.

items.q: How do I place a wholesale order?
items.a: Browse our professional catalog, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can also use our Quick Order Form for faster bulk ordering by product name, or upload CSV files for large recurring orders. Business account holders get preferential pricing automatically.

items.q: What are your minimum order quantities (MOQ)?
items.a: We offer flexible MOQs based on product categories. Many items can be ordered by the unit, while others require case or pallet quantities. Contact our B2B team for specific MOQ details on bulk items. Business account holders receive preferential terms.

items.q: Do I need a business account to order?
items.a: No, you can place orders as a guest. However, opening a free Business Account provides tiered wholesale pricing (up to 20% off at volume thresholds), saved order templates, invoice payment options, and dedicated B2B support.

items.q: What payment methods do you accept for B2B orders?
items.a: We accept all major credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) via Stripe, Klarna, Swish, and bank transfers. Verified business accounts qualify for Net 30 or Net 60 invoice terms after credit approval.

items.q: Can I get a custom quote for a large order?
items.a: Absolutely! Use our Quote Request form or email wholesale@restaurantpack.se with your product list and quantities. Our B2B team will prepare a competitive quote within 24 hours, including any available volume discounts.

items.q: What delivery options do you offer for B2B orders?
items.a: We offer four flexible options: (1) Our own delivery fleet for Stockholm region, (2) DHL partnership for Sweden & Scandinavia, (3) Third-party freight (DB Schenker, PostNord, or your carrier), and (4) Ex-warehouse pickup from our Spånga facility. Choose what works best for your business.

items.q: Do you deliver across Sweden and Europe?
items.a: Yes! We serve all of Sweden, Scandinavia (Norway, Denmark, Finland), and 28+ European countries via DHL and DB Schenker. Shipping costs are calculated based on weight and destination at checkout. Recurring bulk orders qualify for preferential freight rates.

items.q: What are your delivery times for wholesale orders?
items.a: Stockholm area: 1-2 business days with our fleet. Sweden: 2-4 business days via DHL. Scandinavia: 2-4 days. Europe: 3-10 days depending on zone. Ex-warehouse pickup is available immediately after order confirmation during operating hours.

items.q: Can I arrange my own freight carrier?
items.a: Yes! We support third-party freight arrangements. Your carrier can collect Ex-warehouse from Fagerstagatan 13, Spånga. Orders are priced Ex-warehouse for self-arranged pickup. Schedule during our operating hours: Mon-Fri 10 AM-8 PM, Sat-Sun 11 AM-7 PM.

items.q: Do you offer pallet and case delivery?
items.a: Yes, we handle full pallets, mixed pallets, and case quantities. Our Stockholm fleet can deliver pallets directly. For other regions, we arrange freight via DHL Freight, DB Schenker, or PostNord based on your location and order size.

items.q: What products do you supply?
items.a: We specialize in authentic Indo-Pak ingredients (basmati rice, spices, lentils, flours, ghee, condiments), fresh/frozen vegetables when in season, snacks, beverages, and professional kitchen equipment including our signature Anmol Electric Tandoor. Over 150+ brands from India, Pakistan, and Europe.

items.q: Do you have tiered wholesale pricing?
items.a: Yes! Business account holders receive automatic tiered discounts: 10-49 units (-10%), 50-99 units (-16%), 100+ units (-20%). The more you buy, the more you save. Pricing tiers are shown on each product page for logged-in business accounts.

items.q: Can I get samples before placing a large order?
items.a: Yes! Contact wholesale@restaurantpack.se to request product samples. We understand you need to taste and test before committing to case or pallet quantities. Sample costs may apply but can be credited toward your first bulk order.

items.q: What is the Anmol Electric Tandoor?
items.a: Our flagship product! The Anmol Electric Tandoor is a professional-grade electric tandoor oven designed and manufactured by Anmol Restaurant. It's used in our own restaurant and now available to professional kitchens across Sweden and Europe. Perfect for naan, tandoori chicken, kebabs, and more.

items.q: Do you stock products from specific brands I need?
items.a: We carry major Indo-Pak brands: TRS, Shan, MDH, India Gate, National Foods, Ahmed Foods, Laziza, Haldiram's, and many more. If you need a specific brand or product not on our site, email us at wholesale@restaurantpack.se—we can source it for you.

items.q: How do I open a business account?
items.a: Register at /wholesale/register. You'll need your business name, VAT/Org number, and contact details. Basic business accounts are approved instantly for wholesale pricing. Full credit terms (Net 30/60) require verification and credit approval.

items.q: What are the benefits of a business account?
items.a: Business accounts receive: (1) Tiered wholesale pricing up to 20% off, (2) Invoice payment terms (Net 30/60 after verification), (3) Saved order templates for quick reordering, (4) Order history and tracking, (5) Dedicated B2B support, and (6) Preferential freight rates on recurring orders.

items.q: Can I save my regular orders as templates?
items.a: Yes! Use our Quick Order Form to save frequently ordered items as templates. Name them (e.g., 'Weekly Stock Order') and load them with one click for instant reordering. Perfect for restaurants with consistent menu needs.

items.q: Do you provide invoices for business purchases?
items.a: Yes! All B2B orders automatically receive professional invoices with full VAT breakdown. Invoices are emailed immediately after order confirmation and available in your account dashboard. We comply with all EU VAT regulations for cross-border sales.

items.q: How is VAT handled for B2B orders?
items.a: Swedish businesses pay 12% VAT on food products and 25% on other items (tax-inclusive pricing). For B2B cross-border EU sales with a valid VAT number, reverse charge applies (0% VAT—you account for VAT in your country). Non-EU countries follow standard export rules.

items.q: Do I need to pay customs duties for EU deliveries?
items.a: No customs duties within the EU! Since we're based in Sweden (EU member), shipments to other EU countries incur no customs or import fees. Your checkout price is your final price. Standard import rules apply for non-EU countries like Norway (customs may apply).

items.q: Can you provide export documentation for customs?
items.a: Yes! For non-EU shipments requiring customs documentation, we provide complete commercial invoices, packing lists, and origin certificates as needed. Our freight partners handle customs clearance for a smooth delivery experience.

items.q: What is your return policy for wholesale orders?
items.a: We accept returns on unopened, unused products within 14 days for non-perishable items. Perishable goods (fresh/frozen) cannot be returned. Damaged or defective products will be replaced or refunded immediately—contact us with photos within 48 hours of delivery.

items.q: What if an item arrives damaged during shipping?
items.a: Contact us immediately at wholesale@restaurantpack.se with photos. We'll arrange replacement shipment or full refund. All freight is insured. For third-party freight, document damage with your carrier at time of delivery for insurance claims.

items.q: How do you ensure product quality and freshness?
items.a: We operate Anmol Sweets & Restaurant—we use what we sell! All products meet our own restaurant's standards. We rotate stock religiously (FIFO), maintain proper cold chain for perishables, and source directly from reputable suppliers. Your kitchen's success is our reputation.

faqPage.stillQuestionsDesc: Our B2B team is ready to help with bulk orders, custom quotes, and logistics solutions.

europePage.metaTitle: European B2B Wholesale Shipping | 15% Lower Prices | Anmol Wholesale
europePage.metaDescription: Wholesale shipping of authentic Indo-Pak ingredients across Europe. 15% lower B2B pricing for Germany, Norway, Finland & EU. Reliable bulk logistics for professional kitchens.
europePage.heroDesc: Authentic Indo-Pak ingredients and professional kitchen equipment delivered across Europe. Reliable wholesale distribution from Stockholm to your business.
europePage.introLead: Expanding your restaurant, grocery store, or catering business across Europe? Anmol Wholesale brings authentic flavors to your professional kitchen, wherever you operate.
europePage.introDesc: Born from the success of Anmol Sweets & Restaurant in Stockholm, we leverage our deep culinary expertise to supply B2B partners across the European continent. We understand what professional kitchens need: consistency, quality, and a supply chain you can depend on. From basmati rice by the pallet to our signature Anmol Electric Tandoor, we deliver the ingredients and equipment that define authentic Indo-Pak cuisine.
europePage.flexibleOrdersDesc: Order by the case, pallet, or mixed loads. No minimum order requirements for B2B clients.
europePage.transparentRatesDesc: Weight-based shipping calculated at checkout. Preferential rates for recurring bulk orders.
europePage.dhlPartnershipDesc: Reliable European logistics through our DHL partnership. Fully tracked, insured shipments.
europePage.b2bBenefitsDesc: Open a wholesale account for preferential pricing, recurring order management, and dedicated support.
europePage.marketsIntro: We actively ship to B2B clients across all EU member states and key Scandinavian markets.
europePage.dontSeeCountryDesc: We ship to most European destinations. Contact us to discuss your specific logistics needs.
europePage.dhlParcelDesc: Cost-effective solution for regular case orders. Ideal for restaurants and small grocery stores ordering mixed loads of ingredients.
europePage.freightPalletDesc: For bulk orders, pallet quantities, or heavy equipment like the Anmol Electric Tandoor. We partner with DHL Freight, DB Schenker, and other carriers for large shipments.
europePage.exWarehouseDesc: Have an existing freight contract or logistics partner? Arrange pickup directly from our Spånga warehouse at Ex-Warehouse rates.
europePage.supplyCategoriesTitle: What We Supply to European B2B Clients
europePage.supplyCategoriesNote: All products are sourced and verified by Anmol Sweets & Restaurant. We supply what we use in our own professional kitchen.
europePage.customsIntro: Shipping within the EU and EEA is straightforward and hassle-free for B2B clients.
europePage.noCustomsFeesDesc: All products ship freely within the EU/EEA with no additional customs duties or import taxes.
europePage.vatHandlingDesc: B2B clients with valid VAT numbers receive intra-community supply invoicing. Contact us with your VAT registration details.
europePage.ukNonEuDesc: For shipments to the UK, Norway (certain goods), or other non-EU destinations, customs documentation will be provided. Some duties may apply based on local regulations.
europePage.customsSupport: Our logistics team can guide you through any cross-border compliance requirements.
europePage.ctaDesc: Get access to preferential pricing, dedicated account management, and streamlined ordering for recurring shipments. Ideal for restaurants, grocery chains, and caterers with consistent supply needs.
europePage.freightCalculationDesc: Based on weight & destination. Calculated automatically at checkout.
europePage.bulkOrdersDesc: Contact us for preferential pallet rates and recurring order discounts.
europePage.europeanSupportDesc: Questions about shipping to your country or bulk pricing?

privacyPolicy.metaDescription: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data with transparency and care, in full GDPR compliance.
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy and data protection are our priority. Learn how we handle your personal data with transparency and care.
privacyPolicy.introP1: At {businessName} (part of Anmol Sweets & Restaurant), we are deeply committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data with transparency and care. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, {websiteUrl}, or interact with our services.
privacyPolicy.introP2: We operate in full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679 and applicable Swedish data protection laws. Our goal is to ensure you feel secure and confident when you shop with us, whether you are in Stockholm, Sweden, or anywhere else in Europe.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionTitle: What Personal Data Do We Collect?
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionIntro: We collect information that is necessary to provide you with our services and to improve your shopping experience:
privacyPolicy.identityDataDesc: Your first name, last name, trade name (for businesses), email address, phone number, and delivery address, which you provide when creating a B2B account or placing a wholesale order.
privacyPolicy.transactionalDataDesc: Details about products you have purchased and the payment method used. We do not store your full credit card details (processed securely via Stripe).
privacyPolicy.technicalDataDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, and general location collected automatically when you browse our site.
privacyPolicy.communicationDataDesc: Information you provide when contacting us via email, WhatsApp, or our contact form.
privacyPolicy.dataUsageTitle: How We Use Your Personal Data
privacyPolicy.usageOrderFulfillmentDesc: To process payments, pack bulk orders, and arrange freight delivery.
privacyPolicy.usageCustomerServiceDesc: To communicate status and respond to inquiries.
privacyPolicy.usageImprovementsDesc: To analyze how customers use our site and improve the user experience.
privacyPolicy.usageMarketingDesc: With your consent, we send info about new products and special offers.
privacyPolicy.usageSecurityDesc: To prevent fraud and maintain the security of our website.
privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience:
privacyPolicy.essentialCookiesDesc: Necessary for the website to function correctly (e.g., shopping cart).
privacyPolicy.performanceCookiesDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
privacyPolicy.marketingCookiesDesc: Used to provide more relevant advertisements if you have consented.
privacyPolicy.gdprRights: Right to Access|Right to Rectification|Right to Erasure|Right to Restrict Processing|Right to Data Portability|Right to Object
privacyPolicy.gdprExercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at {email}.

termsConditions.metaDescription: Terms and conditions for using restaurantpack.se. Learn about our B2B wholesale policies on orders, payments, delivery, and more.
termsConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsConditions.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. Your use of our website constitutes agreement to these terms.
termsConditions.introText: Welcome to {businessName}. By accessing or using our website {websiteUrl}, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. These terms govern your interaction with our online store and physical location.
termsConditions.generalUseItems: All content is for informational purposes.|Availability is subject to stock levels.|Pricing may change without notice.
termsConditions.ordersItems: Confirmed only upon receipt of payment.|We reserve the right to cancel orders.|Confirmation email is sent after processing.
termsConditions.pricingItems: Prices in SEK, including VAT.|Secure processing via Stripe.|Swish payments require WhatsApp verification.
termsConditions.deliveryItems: Free Stockholm delivery over 500 SEK.|EU shipping calculated by weight.|No fresh/frozen items for EU shipping.
termsConditions.ipDesc1: All content on the site, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of {businessName} or its content suppliers.
termsConditions.ipDesc2: Content may not be copied, reproduced, or distributed without our prior written permission.
termsConditions.liabilityDesc1: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or products.
termsConditions.liabilityDesc2: We do not warrant that the website will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.
termsConditions.liabilityDesc3: Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for the product(s) in question.
termsConditions.governingLawDesc: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Sweden. Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved in Swedish courts.

refundReturn.metaDescription: 14-day return policy for eligible items. Learn about our return process for wholesale customers in Sweden and Europe.
refundReturn.title: Refund & Return Policy
refundReturn.subtitle: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We are committed to providing a clear and fair return process for our customers across Sweden and Europe.
refundReturn.overviewText: At {businessName}, your satisfaction is our top priority. We offer a 14-day return window for eligible items, provided they meet our eligibility criteria for safety and health standards.
refundReturn.eligibleItems: Non-perishable dry goods.|Unused and unopened items.|Original, sealed packaging.|Proof of purchase provided.
refundReturn.nonReturnableItems: Fresh produce and dairy.|Frozen items (paneer, parathas).|Opened or broken seals.|Clearance or final sale items.
refundReturn.inPersonDesc: You are welcome to return eligible items directly to our warehouse at Fagerstagatan 13, Spånga. Please bring your proof of purchase (invoice or order confirmation) with you.
refundReturn.byPostStep1: 1. Contact us first via WhatsApp or email to notify us of your return request.
refundReturn.byPostStep2: 2. Once confirmed, pack the items securely and ship them to our Stockholm address.
refundReturn.byPostNote: Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer, unless the return is due to our error (e.g., wrong or defective item sent).
refundReturn.damagedDesc: If you receive a damaged or incorrect item, contact us immediately. In such cases, we will cover the return shipping costs.
refundReturn.outOfStockDesc: If an item sells out before we process your order, we will contact you immediately for a full refund or suitable alternative.
refundReturn.refundProcessingDesc: Once we receive and inspect your returned item, your refund will be processed automatically to your original payment method within 5-10 business days.
refundReturn.quickQuestionsDesc: Common questions about missing items or out-of-stock products are answered in our FAQ.

myAccount.title: My Account
myAccount.verificationPendingDesc: Your business account is under review. Our team will verify your details within 24-48 hours. Once approved, you'll get access to wholesale pricing and payment terms.
myAccount.wholesaleActiveDesc: You have access to wholesale pricing, volume discounts, and business payment terms.
myAccount.businessAccountDesc: Your wholesale account details and benefits
myAccount.verificationInProgressDesc: Our team is reviewing your business details. This usually takes 24-48 business hours. You'll receive an email notification once your account is verified.
myAccount.verificationMeanwhile: In the meantime, you can browse our products and prepare your first wholesale order.
myAccount.ordersQuotesDesc: Your submitted orders, quote requests, and their status
myAccount.noOrdersQuotes: No orders or quotes submitted yet.
myAccount.orderHistoryDesc: View and track your recent orders.
myAccount.addressesDesc: Manage your billing and shipping addresses
myAccount.paymentMethodsDesc: Manage your payment methods for faster checkout.
myAccount.paymentsSavedNote: Payment methods will be saved during checkout.
myAccount.catalogueDesc: Download our complete product catalogue with images, SKUs, and wholesale pricing. perfect for showing to clients.
myAccount.presentationDesc: Professional presentation about Anmol Wholesale - our services, pricing tiers, and how to partner with us.

wholesaleLanding.metaTitle: B2B Wholesale Hub | 15% Lower Prices | Anmol Wholesale Stockholm
wholesaleLanding.metaDescription: The primary B2B hub for authentic Indo-Pak ingredients & equipment. 15% lower prices, restaurateur-backed quality, and own delivery fleet. Direct manufacturer of Anmol Electric Tandoor. Partner with Stockholm's experts.
wholesaleLanding.badge: From Our Restaurant Kitchen to Yours
wholesaleLanding.heroDesc: Authentic Indo-Pak ingredients, professional kitchen equipment, and the exclusive Anmol Electric Tandoor. Born from Anmol Sweets & Restaurant, trusted by professional kitchens across Sweden and Europe.
wholesaleLanding.storyTitle: We Are Restaurateurs. We Understand Your Needs.
wholesaleLanding.storyP1: Anmol Wholesale was born from the success of Anmol Sweets & Restaurant, a beloved culinary landmark in Stockholm. We are not just suppliers—we are chefs, restaurateurs, and food industry professionals who understand the pressures of a professional kitchen.
wholesaleLanding.storyP2: We sell what we would confidently use ourselves. Every ingredient, every piece of equipment, and every product in our catalog has been tested in our own restaurant kitchen. That's our guarantee of quality.
wholesaleLanding.manufacturerDesc: We make the Anmol Electric Tandoor
wholesaleLanding.whyChooseDesc: We offer a complete B2B solution tailored for professional kitchens, grocery stores, and catering businesses.
wholesaleLanding.benefit1Desc: Wholesale pricing on case and pallet quantities. Volume discounts available for bulk orders and recurring customers.
wholesaleLanding.benefit2Desc: Own fleet for Stockholm deliveries, DHL/Schenker partnership for Sweden & Europe, plus Ex-Warehouse pickup options.
wholesaleLanding.benefit3Desc: Exclusive access to the Anmol Electric Tandoor—manufactured by us for authentic Indo-Pak cuisine at scale.
wholesaleLanding.benefit4Desc: Ocean Pearl Basmati Rice, Khanum Butter Ghee, TRS Gram Flour, and premium bulk ingredients we use in our own kitchen.
wholesaleLanding.benefit5Desc: We ship to Germany, Norway, Finland, UK, and Spain. Expand your business across Europe with our logistics network.
wholesaleLanding.benefit6Desc: Dedicated account management, flexible payment terms for verified businesses, and supply chain reliability you can trust.
wholesaleLanding.portfolioDesc: From signature equipment to bulk staples—everything your professional kitchen needs.
wholesaleLanding.tandoorDesc: Designed for high-performance commercial kitchens across Europe. No charcoal, no mess—just authentic Indo-Pak tandoor cooking with precise temperature control. We are the direct manufacturer, giving you unbeatable pricing and support.
wholesaleLanding.tandoorFeature1: CE Certified for European Market Standards
wholesaleLanding.tandoorFeature5: Multiple Sizes for Different Kitchen Capacities
wholesaleLanding.logisticsDesc: Choose the delivery method that works best for your business operations.
wholesaleLanding.ownFleetDesc: Dedicated delivery service covering all of Stockholm and surrounding municipalities. Flexible scheduling for bulk orders.
wholesaleLanding.dhlDesc: Reliable shipping across Sweden, Scandinavia, and key European markets including Germany, Norway, Finland, UK, and Spain.
wholesaleLanding.exWarehouseDesc: Pickup directly from our warehouse at Fagerstagatan 13, Spånga. Use your own logistics partner for maximum cost efficiency.
wholesaleLanding.ctaTitle: Ready to Partner with Anmol Wholesale?
wholesaleLanding.ctaDesc: Join our network of professional chefs, restaurateurs, grocery stores, and caterers. Experience the difference of working with suppliers who truly understand the food business.

blogPage.metaDescription: Stay tuned for the latest articles, recipes, and news from Anmol Wholesale.
blogPage.title: Our Blog
blogPage.comingSoon: We are currently crafting amazing content for you. Check back soon!
